member.name: T:ClassLibrary.Car
member.summary: Class that represents a car. It contains the Licenseplate and Date attributes and the Price and VehicleType method.

member.name: P:ClassLibrary.Car.LicensePlate
member.summary: The License plate of the car

member.name: P:ClassLibrary.Car.Date
member.summary: The date and time the ticket is issued.

member.name: M:ClassLibrary.Car.Price
member.summary: Method that gives you the price of the ticket for the car
member.returns: The price of the car ticket which is equal to 240 (double)

member.name: M:ClassLibrary.Car.VehicleType
member.summary: Method that gives you the Vehicle Type of the car
member.returns: The vehicle type of the car (string)

member.name: M:ClassLibrary.MC.VehicleType
